title: certificate
extract: Death certificate. Gift certificate. Certificate of authenticity, a document or seal certifying the authenticity of something. Certificate of deposit, or CD, a financial product commonly offered to consumers by banks, thrift institutions and credit unions.
extract_html: Death certificate. Gift certificate. Certificate of authenticity, a document or seal certifying the authenticity of something. Certificate of deposit, or CD, a financial product commonly offered to consumers by banks, thrift institutions and credit unions.
